backstories.clan_founder: This owl is one of the founding members of the Clan.
backstories.clanborn: This owl was hatched in the Clan where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: This owl was hatched in the Clan, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Clan.
backstories.halfclan2: This owl was hatched in another Clan, but chose to come to this Clan to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This owl was hatched in the Clan, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no Clan.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This owl was hatched outside the Clan, but came to live in the Clan with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: This owl joined the Clan by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This owl used to live in a barn, but mostly stayed away from Twolegs. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Clan life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.loner3: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone.
backstories.loner4: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone - until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found someone worth staying for.
backstories.kittypet1: This owl joined the Clan by choice after living life with Twolegs as a captive owl.
backstories.kittypet2: This owl used to live in something called a 'zoo' with Twolegs, but decided to join the Clan.
backstories.kittypet3: This owl used to be a captive owl. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.kittypet4: This owl used to be a captive owl. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got sick, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the belly of a monster. The Twolegs then left {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to fend for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}.
backstories.rogue1: This owl joined the Clan by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This owl used to live in a Twolegplace, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Clan might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This owl used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.abandoned1: This owl was found by the Clan as an owlet and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This owl was hatched outside of the Clan, but was brought to the Clan as an owlet and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This owl was hatcher in another Clan, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as an owlet for the Clan to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This owl was found and taken in after being abandoned by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs as an owlet.
backstories.otherclan1: This owl was hatched in another Clan, but came to this Clan by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: This owl was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: This owl's Clan stayed with the Clan after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clan returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: This owl grew up in another Clan, but chose to leave that life and join the Clan {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This owl was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This owl was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.

backstories.retired_leader: This owl used to be the leader of another Clan before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This owl was once a medicine owl in another Clan.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This owl was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This owl came to this Clan after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Clan and the tyrannical leader that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This owl used to live as a loner, but after another owl chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the Clan.
backstories.refugee3: This owl used to be in captivity, but joined the Clan after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel Twoleg.
backstories.refugee4: This owl used to be in a rogue group, but joined the Clan after fleeing from the group's tyrannical leader.
backstories.refugee5: This owl got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Clan here.
backstories.refugee6: This owl used to be in captivity, but joined the Clan, sick and weak after eating something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} shouldn't have.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this owl's previous Clan. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This owl used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the Clan after something terrible happened to it.

backstories.wandering_healer1: This owl used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This owl used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.guided1: This owl used to be in captivity, but after dreaming of starry-feathered owls, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Clan.
backstories.guided2: This owl used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a set of starry pawprints, and followed them to the Clan.
backstories.guided3: This owl used to live as a loner. A starry-feathered owl appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Clan.
backstories.guided4: This owl used to live in a different Clan, until a sign from StarClan told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This owl was found with a deceased parent. The Clan took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This owl was found with a deceased parent. The Clan took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This owl was found as an owlet among the wreckage of a Monster with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned4: This owl was found as an owlet hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned5: This owl was found as an owlet hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned6: This owl was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny owlet, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This owl was born outside of a Clan.
backstories.outsider2: This owl was born outside of a Clan, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Clan.
backstories.outsider3: This owl was born outside of a Clan, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
